name: Ball Clash
description:
check out my youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6NX9NskT7PsXPldzjadT6w?

A simple and nice offline multiplayer game great for time pass.   use the keys W, A, S, D to controll green sphere and the keys I, J, K, L  or arrow keys to control red sphere your goal is to push your opponent out of the field

there is an error in the windows version sorry but i'll try to upload it soon
